content.text: Accessibility Screen Readers
Why
Screen readers are necessary for blind people, important for partially-sighted users and helpful for people with reading disorders.
content.html: Screen readers are necessary for blind people, important for partially-sighted users and helpful for people with reading disorders.

content.text: What

links.text: a myth that accessibility is just for blind or partially-sighted users

content.text: It is hard to teach about web accessibility without talking about screen readers. Screen readers has become for web accessibility what wheel chairs is for accessibility. Even though it is a myth that accessibility is just for blind or partially-sighted users , screen reader support is a mandatory topic.
content.html: It is hard to teach about web accessibility without talking about screen readers. Screen readers has become for web accessibility what wheel chairs is for accessibility. Even though it is a myth that accessibility is just for blind or partially-sighted users, screen reader support is a mandatory topic.

content.text: If you have done everything you have learned in this course, your site should probably work well in screen readers. That does not necessarily mean that all blind users are able to use it.
content.html: If you have done everything you have learned in this course, your site should probably work well in screen readers. That does not necessarily mean that all blind users are able to use it.

content.text: As the name implies, a screen reader is a tool that reads your screen. Necessary for blind people, important for partially-sighted users and helpful for people with reading disorders.
content.html: As the name implies, a screen reader is a tool that reads your screen. Necessary for blind people, important for partially-sighted users and helpful for people with reading disorders.

content.text: Most common screen readers
You will learn the name of four different screen readers.
content.html: You will learn the name of four different screen readers.

content.text: Mobile

For mobile devices, Apple has the biggest share of screen reader users. The screen reader VoiceOver is built in on iOS. The second most popular is TalkBack for Android, also built in on all Android devices.
content.html: For mobile devices, Apple has the biggest share of screen reader users. The screen reader VoiceOver is built in on iOS. The second most popular is TalkBack for Android, also built in on all Android devices.

content.text: Making sure your site works well with these two is a good starting point. Before we proceed, read these articles:
content.html: Making sure your site works well with these two is a good starting point. Before we proceed, read these articles:

content.text: Desktop and laptop

For desktop and laptop computers, there is two screen readers you should be aware of – NVDA and JAWS . If you have to choose one for testing, go for NVDA. It is free and its popularity is growing. Both are only available for Windows.
content.html: For desktop and laptop computers, there is two screen readers you should be aware of – NVDA and JAWS. If you have to choose one for testing, go for NVDA. It is free and its popularity is growing. Both are only available for Windows.

content.text: How
You will to set the language, and we will test two websites – Toyota and Hyundai.
content.html: You will to set the language, and we will test two websites – Toyota and Hyundai.

content.text: Language

For the screen reader to speak the correct language, it needs to know what language your content is. This is done with the lang attribute in the <html> element. The following example specifies English as the language:
content.html: For the screen reader to speak the correct language, it needs to know what language your content is. This is done with the lang attribute in the <html> element. The following example specifies English as the language:

content.text: <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en">
content.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

content.text: The lang attribute changed from lang="en" to lang="id" . Good for screen readers and good for search engines.
content.html: The lang attribute changed from lang="en" to lang="id". Good for screen readers and good for search engines.

content.text: Language of parts

Sometimes parts of your content is in another language. To make screen readers change their language in the middle of the page, we use the same lang attribute. Check the source code of the link to Bahasa Indonesia on the english page about Dyslexia :
content.html: Sometimes parts of your content is in another language. To make screen readers change their language in the middle of the page, we use the same lang attribute. Check the source code of the link to Bahasa Indonesia on the english page about Dyslexia:

content.text: Bahasa Indonesia
content.html: <a href="https://id.wikipedia.org/wiki/Disleksia" lang="id" hreflang="id">Bahasa Indonesia</a>

content.text: Now the screen reader understands that the words "Bahasa Indonesia" should be read in the language Bahasa Indonesia, not English. It also understand that the target page is in Bahasa Indonesian because of the hreflang attribute.
content.html: Now the screen reader understands that the words "Bahasa Indonesia" should be read in the language Bahasa Indonesia, not English. It also understand that the target page is in Bahasa Indonesian because of the hreflang attribute.

content.text: Screen reader testing

Let's scratch the surface of screen reader testing. In this course, we will not dig deep. Screen readers is a big topic. Use your phone to follow these two examples. You might not hear exactly what's written here, there are many factors that affect the screen reader output.
